Description.Text:
Property Location
Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Madrid Suites is in the heart of Madrid, walking distance from Convent of las Comendadoras de Santiago and Plaza del Dos de Mayo. This apartment is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 40-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Madrid Suites is in the heart of Madrid, walking distance from Convent of las Comendadoras de Santiago and Plaza del Dos de Mayo. This apartment is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Convent of las Comendadoras de Santiago - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza del Dos de Mayo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museo Municipal de Arte Contemporaneo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Teatro Alfil - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Espana - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lope de Vega Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of the City - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fuencarral Market - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Romanticism - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Spanish Senate - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cerralbo Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Plaza de Callao - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Monastery of the Incarnation - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sabatini Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Temple of Debod - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Madrid Suites is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
